description: Reduced numerators of (n-1)^2/(n^2+n+1). Arises in Routh's theorem.
comments: Multiplicative with a(3^e) = 3^(2e-1), p^(2e) otherwise. - _David W. Wilson_, Jun 12 2005
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Routh's Theorem.
maple: seq(numer((n-1)^2/(n^2+n+1)), n=1..51) ; # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 04 2008seq(denom(3/n^2-2), n=0..76) ; # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 04 2008
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
